【英超亞洲挑戰盃】4隊落實！球迷最HAPPY

05月24日(三) 16:06

￼ ￼

￼

￼

￼

香港球迷、今夏瘋狂！繼熱刺本周訪港，今年7月下旬在港舉行的英超亞洲挑戰賽四支隊伍據報亦正式落實！英國傳媒今日廣泛媒報道，除了早前落實的利物浦，另外三支來港的英超勁旅分別是15/16年英超冠軍李斯特城、水晶宮及西布朗。 


每兩年一度於亞洲區舉行的英超亞洲挑戰盃，今屆最初原定其中一個比賽日於上海進行，但最終因賽期不合，主辦單位決定將2日比賽均安排於香港舉行。有別過去幾屆，今屆英超亞洲挑戰盃沒有主隊獲邀參賽，取而代之是4支英超球隊，早前有關方面已透露「Big6」之一的利物浦將會東來，據英國傳媒最新消息，其餘3支球隊分別是羸得15/16年冠軍的李斯特城、水晶宮及西布朗，暫定賽期是7月19日及22日，但有關詳情有待英超賽會正式公布。 

兩日都香港

下隊去邊

Liverpool FC has today confirmed that the first team will head to Hong Kong for the Premier League Asia Trophy this summer.

The eighth edition of the tournament will take place at the Hong Kong Stadium on Wednesday July 19 and Saturday July 22.

The Reds will make their second appearance in the competition alongside fellow Premier League clubs Crystal Palace, Leicester City and West Bromwich Albion. Liverpool first played in the tournament back in 2007.

Jürgen Klopp said: “We’re really looking forward to playing in the Premier League Asia Trophy this summer. It’s important that the club takes part in competitions like this as it gives local fans the opportunity to get closer to the action.

“The club has a huge fanbase in Hong Kong and we hope to put on a good performance for our fans.”

The Premier League Asia Trophy is part of the league’s ongoing commitment to fans in Asia, and to supporting the development of football at all levels in Hong Kong and across the region.

A full programme of coaching and community initiatives, including another Premier Skills coaching programme run in partnership with the Hong Kong Football Association, will run alongside the tournament.

Ticketing information for fans will be announced in early June. Tickets will be sold per matchday (July 19, July 22) with each ticket allowing access to both matches on that day.

Premier League executive chairman Richard Scudamore said: “We are very excited to be returning to Hong Kong this summer for the Premier League Asia Trophy. We know from previous visits that fans in Hong Kong, and across the region, are passionate supporters of our clubs.

“In Crystal Palace, Leicester City, Liverpool and West Bromwich Albion we have a group of excellent clubs, players and managers who will give local fans a fantastic Premier League experience.”

Mark Sutcliffe, chief executive of the Hong Kong Football Association, added: “The Hong Kong Football Association is delighted and honoured to host four Premier League clubs in July for the Premier League Asia Trophy 2017. The passion and enthusiasm for the Premier League in Hong Kong has never been higher and the opportunity to see world-class players in the flesh will be met with great anticipation.

“As co-organisers of the event, the Hong Kong Football Association will do everything it can to ensure that it is the best Asia Trophy ever. With two matchdays and a wide range of community engagement activities, there is a lot to look forward to and personally, I can’t wait.”

做教練啦留係度

Have you had any thoughts on what may be next, though?

I am kind of sure. It’ll be away from football, but in the future who knows? In one year’s time, I might not be able to sleep, might not fancy a beer in the evening and not be feeling hungry, so what am I missing? Is it football? If it is, I might need to get back into it. If not, I have a list like this [stretches out hands] of things to do, a lot of things to work on, so I am quite looking forward to my time out of football. I will have a rest, but I was a professional joiner before I got into football, so I might go back to my roots – construction work, property work, furnishing and so on. I am very interested in a lot of things away from football, so I am looking forward to some time off.

The ​Liverpool Echo report that Sturridge will have an injection in his hip to assist with the discomfort when the team returns to the UK on Friday which is the cause of his unavailability for the international duty. 


With injury continuing to plague his career, the 27-year-old has missed a significant chunk of games during his four years at Anfield, but his supreme talent and game changing ability has led to continued perseverance to identify issues and manage his body, as in peak fitness he is arguably one of the first names on the team sheet.  


The strikers priority is to be ready for the start of pre-season in July, however there remains little assurances as to which club he will be reporting to.

KEANE TO UNITED?

Earlier we told you Sky sources understand Manchester United are planning on signing a central defender this summer and the three options they are pursuing are Michael Keane, Virgil Van Dijk and Victor Lindelof.

So what are the chances of Keane moving back to Old Trafford? United sold Keane to Burnley two-and-a-half years ago for £2m.

Since then he has made his full England debut – against Germany in March – and played 90 times for Burnley.

He has one year left on his contract at Turf Moor.

每逢球季將結束或就快結束，球會都會搞聚餐慰勞一班將士，但今次拿玻里搞嘅慰勞晚宴，就唔係好和諧，據講會長迪羅倫迪斯喺晚宴期間，突然企起身話門將連拿唔應該受一啲外在事物分心，咁樣先可以變得更強，矛頭直指其妻Yolanda Ruiz，結果後者聽完後即刻離場，場面非常尷尬。

連拿事後亦喺社交網絡出聲，表示要顯出紳士風度，就應該唔好理會一啲唔值得關心嘅人，而Yolanda亦差唔多同一時間喺ig話，當統治者失去尊嚴，服從者亦會對佢失去尊重，齊齊抨擊迪羅倫迪斯。有傳雖然迪羅倫迪斯嘗試解釋自己係講笑，但外間即傳2018年約滿嘅連拿，會喺今夏離隊。

隨著利物浦有機會在下季參與歐洲賽，領隊高普堅稱在轉會窗要嘗試引入高質素球員。

「紅軍」今季不時受傷患困擾，文尼、古天奴、拉爾拉拿、佐敦軒達臣、麥迪比都花了不少時間養傷。高普對Omnisport解釋，很多傷患都是在比賽、而非訓練所得：「這些嚴重傷患都是從賽場所得，如果你們問，可以解決這問題嗎？百分百肯定，不可以。不過我們從中學到不少，我們也會引入有質素的球員。」

利物浦今季最後一場會對篤定降班的米杜士堡，球隊現排第4，落後第3位的曼城兩分，並領先第5位的阿仙奴僅1分。高普強調贏獎盃才是最主要：「最好就是贏歐聯，這樣有錦標，下季又可踢歐聯。當冠軍是最好了，歐聯好，足總盃也好。從財政方面看，前4或者更重要，但沒甚麼可比得上贏獎盃。這是我們比賽的目標，沒有人闖進決賽，然後覺得不重要的。」

每逢球季將結束或就快結束，球會都會搞聚餐慰勞一班將士，但今次拿玻里搞嘅慰勞晚宴，就唔係好和諧，據講會長迪羅倫迪斯喺晚宴期間，突然企起身話門將連拿唔應該受一啲外在事物分心，咁樣先可以變得更強，矛頭直指其妻Yolanda Ruiz，結果後者聽完後即刻離場，場面非常尷尬。

連拿事後亦喺社交網絡出聲，表示要顯出紳士風度，就應該唔好理會一啲唔值得關心嘅人，而Yolanda亦差唔多同一時間喺ig話，當統治者失去尊嚴，服從者亦會對佢失去尊重，齊齊抨擊迪羅倫迪斯。有傳雖然迪羅倫迪斯嘗試解釋自己係講笑，但外間即傳2018年約滿嘅連拿，會喺今夏離隊。


連拿個樣加身型都好似一個office打工仔, 仲要低級個隻.
完全唔似龍門身型.

連拿事後亦喺社交網絡出聲，表示要顯出紳士風度，就應該唔好理會一啲唔值得關心嘅人，而Yolanda亦差唔多同一時間喺ig話，當統治者失去尊嚴，服從者亦會對佢失去尊重，齊齊抨擊迪羅倫迪斯。有傳雖然迪羅倫迪斯嘗試解釋自己係講笑，但外間即傳2018年約滿嘅連拿，會喺今夏離隊。

圖為陳7 指導 摩迪
左閘位同翼最緊要，中堅、射手、派牌型防中次要，其他位買唔買都冇所謂

每逢球季將結束或就快結束，球會都會搞聚餐慰勞一班將士，但今次拿玻里搞嘅慰勞晚宴，就唔係好和諧，據講會長迪羅倫迪斯喺晚宴期間，突然企起身話門將連拿唔應該受一啲外在事物分心，咁樣先可以變得更強，矛頭直指其妻Yolanda Ruiz，結果後者聽完後即刻離場，場面非常尷尬。

連拿事後亦喺社交網絡出聲，表示要顯出紳士風度，就應該唔好理會一啲唔值得關心嘅人，而Yolanda亦差唔多同一時間喺ig話，當統治者失去尊嚴，服從者亦會對佢失去尊重，齊齊抨擊迪羅倫迪斯。有傳雖然迪羅倫迪斯嘗試解釋自己係講笑，但外間即傳2018年約滿嘅連拿，會喺今夏離隊。


連拿個樣加身型都好似一個office打工仔, 仲要低級個隻.
完全唔似龍門身型.



好撚FIT



著住衫個時
